languages.text: "Ты встретишь его живым факелом, полыхающим во славу Его!" {n}Голос сестры битвы пылает истовой ненавистью и дрожит от нетерпения претворить обещанное в реальность.{/n}
"What you'll be is a living torch blazing for His glory!" {n}Argenta's voice burns with pure hatred and trembles with impatience to make the promise come true.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты встретишь его живым факелом, полыхающим во славу Его!" {n}Голос сестры битвы пылает истовой ненавистью и дрожит от нетерпения претворить обещанное в реальность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You will meet him like a living torch blazing for His glory!" {n}The Sister of Battle's voice burns with pure hatred and trembles with impatience to make the promise come true.{/n}
"You will meet him like a living torch blazing for His glory!" {n}The Sister of Battle's voice burns with pure hatred and trembles with impatience to make the promise come true.{/n}
"You will meet him like a living torch blazing for His glory!" {n}The Sister of Battle's voice burns with pure hatred and trembles with impatience to make the promise come true.{/n}

"What you'll be is a living torch blazing for His glory!" {n}Argenta's voice burns with pure hatred and trembles with impatience to make the promise come true.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr werdet eine lebende Fackel sein, die zu seinen Ehren brennt!" {n}In Argentas Stimme brennt purer Hass und sie zittert vor lauter Ungeduld, dieses Versprechen umzusetzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What you'll be is a living torch blazing for His glory!" {n}Argenta's voice burns with pure hatred and trembles with impatience to make the promise come true.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet ihm begegnen wie eine lebende Fackel, die zu seinen Ehren brennt!" {n}In der Stimme der Schwester der Schlacht brennt purer Hass und sie zittert vor lauter Ungeduld, dieses Versprechen umzusetzen.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous, en revanche, vous vous transformerez en torche vivante, pour le plus grand bonheur de Sa gloire ! » {n}La voix d'Argenta brûle de haine et d'envie de faire de sa promesse une réalité.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What you'll be is a living torch blazing for His glory!" {n}Argenta's voice burns with pure hatred and trembles with impatience to make the promise come true.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous, en revanche, vous vous transformerez en torche vivante, pour le plus grand bonheur de Sa gloire ! » {n}La voix d'Argenta brûle de haine et d'envie de faire de sa promesse une réalité.{/n}

languages.text: “在神皇的荣耀之下，你会像火炬一样熊熊燃烧！”{n}阿洁塔的声音燃烧着纯粹的憎恶。她急不可耐地颤抖着，迫不及待要兑现她的诺言。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What you'll be is a living torch blazing for His glory!" {n}Argenta's voice burns with pure hatred and trembles with impatience to make the promise come true.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “在神皇的荣耀之下，你会像火炬一样熊熊燃烧！”{n}战斗修女的声音燃烧着纯粹的憎恶。她急不可耐地颤抖着，迫不及待要兑现她的诺言。{/n}

languages.text: 「あの方の栄光のため、燃え上がる生きたたいまつのように生きるのだ！」{n}アルジェンタの声は心からの憎しみに燃えて、約束を実現させようという焦りで震える。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What you'll be is a living torch blazing for His glory!" {n}Argenta's voice burns with pure hatred and trembles with impatience to make the promise come true.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あの方の栄光のため、燃え上がる生きた松明のように、あの方に対面するのだ！」{n}バトルシスターの声は心からの憎しみに燃えて、約束を実現させようという焦りで震える。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Lo que serás es una antorcha viva ardiendo por la gloria del Emperador!». {n}La voz de Argenta arde de puro odio y se estremece de impaciencia por cumplir la promesa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What you'll be is a living torch blazing for His glory!" {n}Argenta's voice burns with pure hatred and trembles with impatience to make the promise come true.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Te encontrarás con él como una antorcha viva ardiendo por Su gloria!». {n}La voz de la Hermana de la Batalla arde de puro odio y se estremece de impaciencia por cumplir la promesa.{/n}

languages.text: "Seni bekleyen tek gelecek, O'nun nuruyla cayır cayır yanan canlı bir meşale olmak." {n}Argenta'nın nefretle tutuşan sesi, vaadini yerine getirme arzusunun sabırsızlığıyla titriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What you'll be is a living torch blazing for His glory!" {n}Argenta's voice burns with pure hatred and trembles with impatience to make the promise come true.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Senin olup olabileceğin tek şey, O'nun şanı uğruna yanan, yaşayan bir meşale." {n}Argenta'nın sesi nefretle çalkalanırken vaadini yerine getirme arzusunun sabırsızlığı da hissediliyor.{/n}
